transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Darshan ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan Darshan.
Customer: Darshan ji namaste Imran baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se kaise hain sir aap?
Executive: Haan theek hai sir boliye.
Customer: Haan ji sir kal baat nahi ho payi thi sir kal aapne time bhi diya tha sir 12 baje ke baad ka hai na?
Customer: Haan ji sir kuch bylead bhi maine aapko bataya tha sir over the call sir I hope aapne suggest usko consume bhi kiya hoga.
Customer: Haan consume karega sir consume hota hai na.
Executive: Haan haan abhi koi doubt hai koi issue hai to sir to bataiye sir.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa hi lead acha dekho tum yesterday se yesterday se acha lead dega aisa acha lead de do baad mein main aur promote karne ka main koshish karega nahi to kyun sir mere ko kyun nahi chahiye bolo wo bolo sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi main totally agree kar raha hun.
Customer: Sir acha lead aayega to mere ko hota hai business hota hai acha bhi nahi hua to aur promote kyun hota hai.
Executive: Main totally agree kar raha hun sir.
Customer: Udhar nahi to udhar aisa nahi hai nahi chahiye bolenge na.
Customer: Acha business aayega to next promote ka main chinta karega nahi to kyun mere ko chahiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul main agree kar raha hun sir isiliye na main sir dekhiye sir hamara hamesha suggestion hota hai.
Customer: Isliye sir ye dekho main Justdial mein iske Justdial mein one and half lakh ka mera paisa ho gaya isliye main Justdial wo stop karega aur IndiaMART ka main IndiaMART service acha hai mere ko mera friend bolega main bhi dikhega isliye IndiaMART ka aayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi totally.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: To main ye keh raha hun sir dekhiye main sari cheeze aapka main samajh raha hun sir ki aapne invest kara sir IndiaMART mein sir business business ko leke hai na sir ki aapka business grow kare sir yahan se bylead inquiry mile sir hai na aur isiliye maine sir kal bhi maine aapka bylead check kiya tha sir aur hamara ek suggestion hamesha hota hai sir ki jaise aap acha bylead keh rahe ho na sir hamare according kya hota hai ki sir hum bylead aapko suggest kar sakte hain sir aur mera hamara hamesha suggestion hota hai sir ki aap recent bylead ko consume kijiye max to max sir four hours ke andar ka sir usme kya hoga aur sath hi sath aap aise bylead ko consume kijiye sir jahan pe buyer ne apna maximum detail put up kiya hua hai sir jaise mobile number bhi dala hai whatsapp number bhi dala hua hai sir mail id bhi unke verified hai sir sir aise buyer se aap connect kijiye sir definitely aapko sir positive response milega sir jaise main ek bylead aapka check kar raha tha sir mexican grass ka bangaluru karnataka se aaya hua hai sir do ghanta pehle sir 100 feet ka.
Customer: Haan sir wo consume 100 feet ka nahi hai 100 feet ka quantity jyada kam hai isliye wo consume nahi hoga aur dusra dusra log ka dolphin lawn grass ka 2000 square feet ka wo karega mexican grass carpet ka wo ho gaya.
Executive: Haan haan to aapka deal location sirf karnataka hi target karoge sir ya particular aur state bhi aap target karte hain sir.
Customer: Nahi sir karnataka bas sir particular state karega to wo sabhi quantity kam wala aata hai aur dusra dusra category nahi agar main aapke near aapke near by state se sir near by state se ya city se agar main thoda sa bulk wala agar order hum de to kya wo relevant rahega aapka sir kyunki ek mujhe dikh raha tha sir aapka super black polish granite slab isme aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi hai sir wo nahi hai wo granite slab hai wo nahi hota hai.
Executive: Acha to abhi mujhe bangaluru location se sir bas do bylead aapka dikh rahe hai sir isko mexican grass ka tha 100 feet ka lekin inka requirement tha sir abhi jo mujhe bangaluru ka 100 feet ka 100 feet ka quantity kam hai na isliye main wo consume nahi kare.
Executive: Acha acha aapke according quantity kam hai iska hai na sir.
Customer: Haan ya.
Executive: But aapka minimum order quantity kya rehta hai sir?
Customer: 200 square feet.
Executive: Sorry sir?
Customer: 200 square feet wo 100 square feet hai na.
Executive: Haan haan samajh gaya 200 200 feet ya usse upar ka aapka rehta hai hai na.
Customer: Haan ya.
Executive: Acha acha nahi sir dekhiye bahut sare hamare sir business related jo bylead hote hain na sir wo sir as a sample ke liye bhi kabhi mangte hain abhi aap isme dekhiyega na to inko abhi sample ke requirement inko chahiye sir is bylead mein aap dekhiyega ki type of requirement kya hai unka to unhone 100 feet ka abhi dala hua hai sir mexican grass ka sample related sir might be sir kya pata aapko aapka product acha lagta hai to wo aapko business related sir bulk order bhi de sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na sir to isliye unhone sample only dala hua hai ki abhi aap unka jo requirement hai na wo sample se related hai sir aur aap business related bylead agar consume karte ho na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi hai main kuch customer dikhega na nahi aisa nahi hai aisa nahi sab wo quantity kitna chahiye utna bhi dalna hai.
Executive: Sir quantity se bas wahi hai na sir ki aapko filter laga ke sir check karna padega bangaluru location pe aapko karnataka ka aur bulk wala aapko check karna padega sir laga ke sir uske according jo bhi bylead hamare notification nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Notification nahi aa raha hai sir kisme notification nahi aa raha hai aapka?
Customer: Haan notification kal se acha aata hai wo nahi hai wo problem nahi hai main kya bola wo main near by bangalore ka aur karnataka ka main search karna padega na wo notification nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Filter filter filter filter laga ke sir filter laga ke sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek baar aap filter laga lijiyega na bylead pe ja ke sir location pe ja ke aap apna karnataka ka filter laga lijiye sir to karnataka se aapke jo bhi byleads hamare paas available hogi na sir definitely wo aapko sir show hoga sir.
Executive: Theek hai jo bhi bylead hamare portal pe available hoga bas thoda sa aap sir active rahiye service ko leke main aapko ensure kar raha hun sir jarur aapka business aayega baki sir calls wagera bhi jo aa rahi thi sir wo bhi aapka bahut jyada miss ho raha tha sir jaise november mein sir 11 call aapke paas aayi hai sir aath aapne answer kiya teen call aapne.
Customer: Wo wo nahi aa raha hai aayega to wo sabhi log quantity kam hota hai nahi to mere ko related nahi hota hai.
Executive: Fir bhi sir calls to aapke paas aa rahi hai usme sir aap dekhoge 30% ke aas paas aapka call bhi miss ho raha hai sir september mein 10 call aayi thi paanch aapne haan boliye.
Customer: Miss ho gaya kya?
Executive: Haan haan matlab lagabhag last three months ka aapka discuss karu na to september mein total number of calls aapke paas 10 aayi thi five aapne answer kiya tha five aapne miss kiya tha sir matlab 50% aapne miss kiya tha.
Customer: Haan haan ya ya us time pe us time pe kya hoga mere ko spam number se reject hota hai us time pe isliye wo sabhi reject ho gaya mere ko call nahi aa raha hai sabhi call se reject ho gaya isliye main.
Executive: Acha aapke paas calls to kuch aapne answer bhi kiye sir jaise abhi aapka main check kar raha tha agar november mahine ka main baat karu to 11 call aayi hai aapke paas total number of calls 11 sir usme aapne aath answer kiya hai sir teen call aapne miss kiya hai to aath aap answer bhi kar rahe ho sir aapka average time bhi hamara thoda thoda busy ho gaye to main baad mein call back kare karungi.
Executive: Acha hamara ek suggestion hota hai sir ki agar aap busy ho na to buyer se jarur baat kijiye sir unko bol dijiye sir ki aap unko 10 minute ya koi time ke according unko connect kar lijiye sir so that ek opportunity ho jati hai na sir sath hi sath main aapka rating bhi check kar raha tha sir che user ne aapko rating bhi diya hua hai sir out of five sir 4.2 ka aapka rating bhi hai sir to rating bhi kafi acha hai sir thoda sa active rahiye sir aur filter ke filter laga ke aap use kijiye definitely aapko sir business bhi milega sir aur bylead bhi aapko jo bhi hamare portal pe available hoga ab aapko dikhega theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Baki okay sir aisa abhi business bhi acha de do main april mein march april mein main aur promotion promote karna.
Executive: Definitely main ek kaam karta hun main gaurav ko bhi bol deta hun sir ki wo whatsapp pe bhi na aapse sir connected bhi rahenge theek hai kuch agar possible hota hai unko bhi milta hai sir aapko product ko leke na agar kuch filter out karke to kuch bylead bhi wo aapko share bhi kar denge aur unka ek baar feedback bhi aapse lenge theek hai aap chahe to mera bhi number save kar lijiyega koi bhi problem hoga service ko leke to aap mujhe bhi connect kar sakte hain is number pe theek hai sir baki sir aapka jo feedback aaya tha not satisfied ka sir agar aapka abhi permission ho to main usko close kar raha hun theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hello haan aur hamare discussion ke regarding ek mail aayega sir aapke paas aapna positive feedback ya jo bhi aapka feedback hoga jarur share kijiye ga aap theek hai sir.
Executive: Abhi main isko close kar raha hun sir aapka not satisfied ka feedback sir.
Customer: Haan close karo.
Executive: Chaliye okay sir thank you sir have a nice day sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants good quality buyleads.

- Wants to promote business.

- Not receiving notifications.

- Calls are getting missed.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide good quality leads.

- Executive suggested consuming recent buyleads.

- Executive suggested using filters for location.

- Executive informed about the missed calls.

- Executive will ask Gaurav to connect on WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the not satisfied feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a mail regarding the discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, missed calls, filters
